name: Project Breakout (milmalho)
description:
Enemies have taken the hostage into their safe house. Your objective is to secure and extract the hostage and kill everyone inside the house. Do so as fast as you can while taking minimal damage. 

Controls: 

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Backward

D - Right

R - Reload

L-Shift - Sprint

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right Mouse - Aim

Mouse Scroll - Swap Weapons

ESC - Menu
